name: confChan
description: Select External start (i.e. input channel) and Clock1/Clock2 settings

name: clock1Delay
description: How many ticks to wait (i.e. delay) for the 1'st counter

name: clock2Delay
description: How many ticks to wait (i.e. delay) for the 2'nd counter

name: outputCntr
description: Output pulse counter that occured in the channel

name: ALL_CHANNELS
description: All CTC channels to access in one chunk
